/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with trees and buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The buildings, painted in shades of red and orange, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the red and orange hues of the buildings contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
